017package org.apache.juneau.annotation;
018
019import static java.lang.annotation.ElementType.*;
020import static java.lang.annotation.RetentionPolicy.*;
021
022import java.lang.annotation.*;
023import java.util.*;
024
025import org.apache.juneau.collections.*;
026import org.apache.juneau.http.annotation.*;
027import org.apache.juneau.httppart.*;
028import org.apache.juneau.oapi.*;
029
030/**
031 * Swagger/OpenAPI/JSON Schema annotation.
032 *
033 * <p>
034 * The Schema Object allows the definition of input and output data types.
035 * These types can be objects, but also primitives and arrays.
036 * This annotation is based on the JSON Schema Specification and supports multiple versions:
037 * <ul>
038 *    <li><b>JSON Schema Draft 04</b> - Core properties (via Swagger 2.0/OpenAPI 3.0)
039 *    <li><b>JSON Schema Draft 2020-12</b> - Extended properties and updated semantics
040 * </ul>
041 *
042 * <p>
043 * For backward compatibility, all Swagger 2.0 and OpenAPI 3.0 properties are supported.
044 * New Draft 2020-12 properties are opt-in and can be used alongside existing properties.
045 *
046 * <p>
047 * Used to populate the auto-generated Swagger documentation and UI for server-side <ja>@Rest</ja>-annotated classes.
048 * <br>Also used to define OpenAPI schema information for POJOs serialized through {@link OpenApiSerializer} and parsed through {@link OpenApiParser}.
049 *
050 * <h5 class='section'>Examples:</h5>
051 * <p class='bjava'>
052 *    <jc>// A response object thats a hex-encoded string</jc>
053 *    <ja>@Response</ja>(
054 *       schema=<ja>@Schema</ja>(
055 *          type=<js>"string"</js>,
056 *          format=<js>"binary"</js>
057 *       )
058 *    )
059 * </p>
060 * <p class='bjava'>
061 *    <jc>// A request body consisting of an array of arrays, the internal
062 *    // array being of type integer, numbers must be between 0 and 63 (inclusive)</jc>
063 *    <ja>@Content</ja>(
064 *       schema=<ja>@Schema</ja>(
065 *          items=<ja>@Items</ja>(
066 *             type=<js>"array"</js>,
067 *             items=<ja>@SubItems</ja>(
068 *                type=<js>"integer"</js>,
069 *                minimum=<js>"0"</js>,
070 *                maximum=<js>"63"</js>
071 *             )
072 *       )
073 *       )
074 *    )
075 * </p>
076 * <p class='bjava'>
077 *    <jc>// Using Draft 2020-12 properties</jc>
078 *    <ja>@Schema</ja>(
079 *       type=<js>"number"</js>,
080 *       exclusiveMaximumValue=<js>"100"</js>,  <jc>// Draft 2020-12 numeric format</jc>
081 *       examples={<js>"50"</js>, <js>"75"</js>, <js>"99"</js>},  <jc>// Draft 2020-12 property</jc>
082 *       deprecatedProperty=<jk>true</jk>  <jc>// Draft 2020-12 property</jc>
083 *    )
084 * </p>
085 *
086 * <h5 class='section'>See Also:</h5><ul>
087 *    <li class='link'><a class="doclink" href="https://juneau.apache.org/docs/topics/JuneauBeanSwagger2">juneau-bean-swagger-v2</a>
088 *    <li class='link'><a class="doclink" href="https://juneau.apache.org/docs/topics/JuneauBeanJsonSchema">juneau-bean-jsonschema</a>
089 *    <li class='extlink'><a class="doclink" href="https://swagger.io/specification/v2#schemaObject">Swagger 2.0 Schema Object</a>
090 *    <li class='extlink'><a class="doclink" href="https://spec.openapis.org/oas/v3.0.3#schema-object">OpenAPI 3.0 Schema Object</a>
091 *    <li class='extlink'><a class="doclink" href="https://json-schema.org/draft/2020-12/json-schema-core.html">JSON Schema Draft 2020-12 Core</a>
092 *    <li class='extlink'><a class="doclink" href="https://json-schema.org/draft/2020-12/json-schema-validation.html">JSON Schema Draft 2020-12 Validation</a>
093
094 * </ul>
095 */
096@Documented
097@Target({PARAMETER,METHOD,TYPE,FIELD})
098@Retention(RUNTIME)
099@Repeatable(SchemaAnnotation.Array.class)
100@ContextApply(SchemaAnnotation.Apply.class)
101public @interface Schema {
102
103   /**
104    * <mk>default</mk> field of the <a class="doclink" href="https://swagger.io/specification/v2#schemaObject">Swagger Schema Object</a>.
105    *
106    * <p>
107    * Declares the value of the parameter that the server will use if none is provided, for example a "count" to control the number of results per page might default to 100 if not supplied by the client in the request.
108    * <br>(Note: "default" has no meaning for required parameters.)
109    *
110    * <p>
111    * Additionally, this value is used to create instances of POJOs that are then serialized as language-specific examples in the generated Swagger documentation
112    * if the examples are not defined in some other way.
113    *
114    * <p>
115    * The format of this value is a string.
116    * <br>Multiple lines are concatenated with newlines.
117    *
118    * <h5 class='section'>Examples:</h5>
119    * <p class='bjava'>
120    *    <jk>public</jk> Order placeOrder(
121    *       <ja>@Header</ja>(<js>"X-PetId"</js>)
122    *       <ja>@Schema</ja>(_default=<js>"100"</js>)
123    *       <jk>long</jk> <jv>petId</jv>,
124    *
125    *       <ja>@Header</ja>(<js>"X-AdditionalInfo"</js>)
126    *       <ja>@Schema</ja>(format=<js>"uon"</js>, _default=<js>"(rushOrder=false)"</js>)
127    *       AdditionalInfo <jv>additionalInfo</jv>,
128    *
129    *       <ja>@Header</ja>(<js>"X-Flags"</js>)
130    *       <ja>@Schema</ja>(collectionFormat=<js>"uon"</js>, _default=<js>"@(new-customer)"</js>)
131    *       String[] <jv>flags</jv>
132    *    ) {...}
133    * </p>
134    *
135    * <h5 class='section'>Used for:</h5>
136    * <ul class='spaced-list'>
137    *    <li>
138    *       Server-side schema-based parsing.
139    *    <li>
140    *       Server-side generated Swagger documentation.
141    *    <li>
142    *       Client-side schema-based serializing.
143    * </ul>
144    *
145    * @return The annotation value.
146    */
147   String[] _default() default {};
148
149   /**
150    * <mk>enum</mk> field of the <a class="doclink" href="https://swagger.io/specification/v2#schemaObject">Swagger Schema Object</a>.
151    *
152    * <p>
153    * If specified, the input validates successfully if it is equal to one of the elements in this array.
154    *
155    * <p>
156    * If validation fails during serialization or parsing, the part serializer/parser will throw a {@link SchemaValidationException}.
157    * <br>On the client-side, this gets converted to a <c>RestCallException</c> which is thrown before the connection is made.
158    * <br>On the server-side, this gets converted to a <c>BadRequest</c> (400).
159    *
160    * <p>
161    * The format is either individual values or a comma-delimited list.
162    * <br>Multiple lines are concatenated with newlines.
163    *
164    * <h5 class='section'>Examples:</h5>
165    * <p class='bjava'>
166    *    <jc>// Comma-delimited list</jc>
167    *    <jk>public</jk> Collection&lt;Pet&gt; findPetsByStatus(
168    *       <ja>@Header</ja>(<js>"X-Status"</js>)
169    *       <ja>@Schema</ja>(_enum=<js>"AVAILABLE,PENDING,SOLD"</js>)
170    *       PetStatus <jv>status</jv>
171    *    ) {...}
172    * </p>
173    *
174    * <h5 class='section'>Used for:</h5>
175    * <ul class='spaced-list'>
176    *    <li>
177    *       Server-side schema-based parsing validation.
178    *    <li>
179    *       Server-side generated Swagger documentation.
180    *    <li>
181    *       Client-side schema-based serializing validation.
182    * </ul>
183    *
184    * @return The annotation value.
185    */
186   String[] _enum() default {};
187
188   /**
189    * <mk>$ref</mk> field of the <a class="doclink" href="https://swagger.io/specification/v2#schemaObject">Swagger Schema Object</a>.
190    *
191    * <p>
192    *    A JSON reference to the schema definition.
193    *
194    * <h5 class='section'>Notes:</h5><ul>
195    *    <li class='note'>
196    *       The format is a <a href='https://tools.ietf.org/html/draft-pbryan-zyp-json-ref-03'>JSON Reference</a>.
197    * </ul>
198    *
199    * @return The annotation value.
200    */
201   String $ref() default "";
202
203   /**
204    * <mk>additionalProperties</mk> field of the <a class="doclink" href="https://swagger.io/specification/v2#schemaObject">Swagger Schema Object</a>.
205    *
206    * <h5 class='section'>Notes:</h5><ul>
207    *    <li class='note'>
208    *       The format is a <a class="doclink" href="https://juneau.apache.org/docs/topics/JuneauBeanSwagger2">juneau-bean-swagger-v2</a> object.
209    *       <br>Multiple lines are concatenated with newlines.
210    * </ul>
211    *
212    * @return The annotation value.
213    */
214   String[] additionalProperties() default {};
215
216   /**
217    * <mk>allOf</mk> field of the <a class="doclink" href="https://swagger.io/specification/v2#schemaObject">Swagger Schema Object</a>.
218    *
219    * <h5 class='section'>Notes:</h5><ul>
220    *    <li class='note'>
221    *       The format is a <a class="doclink" href="https://juneau.apache.org/docs/topics/JuneauBeanSwagger2">juneau-bean-swagger-v2</a> object.
222    *       <br>Multiple lines are concatenated with newlines.
223    * </ul>
224    *
225    * @return The annotation value.
226    */
227   String[] allOf() default {};
228
229   /**
230    * Synonym for {@link #allowEmptyValue()}.
231    *
232    * @return The annotation value.
233    */
234   boolean aev() default false;
235
236   /**
237    * <mk>allowEmptyValue</mk> field of the <a class='doclink' href='https://swagger.io/specification/v2#parameterObject'>Swagger Parameter Object</a>.
238    *
239    * <p>
240    * Sets the ability to pass empty-valued heaver values.
241    *
242    * <h5 class='section'>Used for:</h5>
243    * <ul class='spaced-list'>
244    *    <li>
245    *       Server-side schema-based parsing validation.
246    *    <li>
247    *       Server-side generated Swagger documentation.
248    *    <li>
249    *       Client-side schema-based serializing validation.
250    * </ul>
251    *
252    * <p>
253    * <b>Note:</b>  This is technically only valid for either query or formData parameters, but support is provided anyway for backwards compatability.
254    *
255    * @return The annotation value.
256    */
257   boolean allowEmptyValue() default false;
258
259   /**
260    * Synonym for {@link #collectionFormat()}.
261    *
262    * @return The annotation value.
263    */
264   String cf() default "";
265
266   /**
267    * <mk>collectionFormat</mk> field.
268    *
269    * <p>
270    * Note that this field isn't part of the Swagger 2.0 specification, but the specification does not specify how
271    * items are supposed to be represented.
272    *
273    * <p>
274    * Determines the format of the array if <c>type</c> <js>"array"</js> is used.
275    * <br>Can only be used if <c>type</c> is <js>"array"</js>.
276    *
277    * <p>
278    * Static strings are defined in {@link CollectionFormatType}.
279    *
280    * <p>
281    * Note that for collections/arrays parameters with POJO element types, the input is broken into a string array before being converted into POJO elements.
282    *
283    * <h5 class='section'>Used for:</h5>
284    * <ul class='spaced-list'>
285    *    <li>
286    *       Server-side schema-based parsing.
287    *    <li>
288    *       Server-side generated Swagger documentation.
289    *    <li>
290    *       Client-side schema-based serializing.
291    * </ul>
292    *
293    * <p>
294    * Note that for collections/arrays parameters with POJO element types, the input is broken into a string array before being converted into POJO elements.
295    *
296    * <ul class='values'>
297    *    <li><js>"csv"</js> (default) - Comma-separated values (e.g. <js>"foo,bar"</js>).
298    *    <li><js>"ssv"</js> - Space-separated values (e.g. <js>"foo bar"</js>).
299    *    <li><js>"tsv"</js> - Tab-separated values (e.g. <js>"foo\tbar"</js>).
300    *    <li><js>"pipes</js> - Pipe-separated values (e.g. <js>"foo|bar"</js>).
301    *    <li><js>"multi"</js> - Corresponds to multiple parameter instances instead of multiple values for a single instance (e.g. <js>"foo=bar&amp;foo=baz"</js>).
302    *    <li><js>"uon"</js> - UON notation (e.g. <js>"@(foo,bar)"</js>).
303    * </ul>
304    *
305    * @return The annotation value.
306    */
307   String collectionFormat() default "";
308
309   /**
310    * Synonym for {@link #description()}.
311    *
312    * @return The annotation value.
313    */
314   String[] d() default {};
315
316   /**
317    * <mk>description</mk> field of the <a class="doclink" href="https://swagger.io/specification/v2#schemaObject">Swagger Schema Object</a>.
318    *
319    * <p>
320    * A brief description of the body. This could contain examples of use.
321    *
322    * <h5 class='section'>Examples:</h5>
323    * <p class='bjava'>
324    *    <jc>// Used on parameter</jc>
325    *    <ja>@RestPost</ja>
326    *    <jk>public void</jk> addPet(
327    *       <ja>@Content</ja> <ja>@Schema</ja>(description=<js>"Pet object to add to the store"</js>) Pet <jv>input</jv>
328    *    ) {...}
329    * </p>
330    * <p class='bjava'>
331    *    <jc>// Used on class</jc>
332    *    <ja>@RestPost</ja>
333    *    <jk>public void</jk> addPet(Pet <jv>input</jv>) {...}
334    *
335    *    <ja>@Content</ja> <ja>@Schema</ja>(description=<js>"Pet object to add to the store"</js>)
336    *    <jk>public class</jk> Pet {...}
337    * </p>
338    *
339    * <h5 class='section'>Notes:</h5><ul>
340    *    <li class='note'>
341    *       The format is plain text.
342    *       <br>Multiple lines are concatenated with newlines.
343    *    <li class='note'>
344    *       Supports <a class="doclink" href="https://juneau.apache.org/docs/topics/RestServerSvlVariables">SVL Variables</a> (e.g. <js>"$L{my.localized.variable}"</js>) for the swagger generator.
345    * </ul>
346    *
347    * @return The annotation value.
348    */
349   String[] description() default {};
350
351   /**
352    * Synonym for {@link #_default()}.
353    *
354    * @return The annotation value.
355    */
356   String[] df() default {};
357
358   /**
359    * <mk>discriminator</mk> field of the <a class="doclink" href="https://swagger.io/specification/v2#schemaObject">Swagger Schema Object</a>.
360    *
361    * <h5 class='section'>Notes:</h5><ul>
362    *    <li class='note'>
363    *       The format is a <a class="doclink" href="https://juneau.apache.org/docs/topics/JuneauBeanSwagger2">juneau-bean-swagger-v2</a> object.
364    *       <br>Multiple lines are concatenated with newlines.
365    * </ul>
366    *
367    * @return The annotation value.
368    */
369   String discriminator() default "";
370
371   /**
372    * Synonym for {@link #_enum()}.
373    *
374    * @return The annotation value.
375    */
376   String[] e() default {};
377
378   /**
379    * Synonym for {@link #exclusiveMaximum()}.
380    *
381    * @return The annotation value.
382    */
383   boolean emax() default false;
384
385   /**
386    * Synonym for {@link #exclusiveMinimum()}.
387    *
388    * @return The annotation value.
389    */
390   boolean emin() default false;
391
392   /**
393    * <mk>exclusiveMaximum</mk> field of the <a class="doclink" href="https://swagger.io/specification/v2#schemaObject">Swagger Schema Object</a>.
394    *
395    * <p>
396    * Defines whether the maximum is matched exclusively.
397    *
398    * <p>
399    * If validation fails during serialization or parsing, the part serializer/parser will throw a {@link SchemaValidationException}.
400    * <br>On the client-side, this gets converted to a <c>RestCallException</c> which is thrown before the connection is made.
401    * <br>On the server-side, this gets converted to a <c>BadRequest</c> (400).
402    *
403    * <p>
404    * Only allowed for the following types: <js>"integer"</js>, <js>"number"</js>.
405    * <br>If <jk>true</jk>, must be accompanied with <c>maximum</c>.
406    *
407    * <h5 class='section'>Notes:</h5><ul>
408    *    <li class='note'>
409    *       <b>Deprecated in JSON Schema Draft 2020-12:</b> This boolean format is from Swagger 2.0/OpenAPI 3.0 and JSON Schema Draft 04.
410    *       Consider using {@link #exclusiveMaximumValue()} for Draft 2020-12 compliance, which uses a numeric value instead.
411    *       For backward compatibility, if {@link #exclusiveMaximumValue()} is set, it takes precedence over this property.
412    * </ul>
413    *
414    * <h5 class='section'>Used for:</h5>
415    * <ul class='spaced-list'>
416    *    <li>
417    *       Server-side schema-based parsing validation.
418    *    <li>
419    *       Server-side generated Swagger documentation.
420    *    <li>
421    *       Client-side schema-based serializing validation.
422    * </ul>
423    *
424    * @return The annotation value.
425    * @deprecated Use {@link #exclusiveMaximumValue()} for JSON Schema Draft 2020-12 compliance.
426    */
427   @Deprecated
428   boolean exclusiveMaximum() default false;
429
430   /**
431    * <mk>exclusiveMinimum</mk> field of the <a class="doclink" href="https://swagger.io/specification/v2#schemaObject">Swagger Schema Object</a>.
432    *
433    * <p>
434    * Defines whether the minimum is matched exclusively.
435    *
436    * <p>
437    * If validation fails during serialization or parsing, the part serializer/parser will throw a {@link SchemaValidationException}.
438    * <br>On the client-side, this gets converted to a <c>RestCallException</c> which is thrown before the connection is made.
439    * <br>On the server-side, this gets converted to a <c>BadRequest</c> (400).
440    *
441    * <p>
442    * Only allowed for the following types: <js>"integer"</js>, <js>"number"</js>.
443    * <br>If <jk>true</jk>, must be accompanied with <c>minimum</c>.
444    *
445    * <h5 class='section'>Notes:</h5><ul>
446    *    <li class='note'>
447    *       <b>Deprecated in JSON Schema Draft 2020-12:</b> This boolean format is from Swagger 2.0/OpenAPI 3.0 and JSON Schema Draft 04.
448    *       Consider using {@link #exclusiveMinimumValue()} for Draft 2020-12 compliance, which uses a numeric value instead.
449    *       For backward compatibility, if {@link #exclusiveMinimumValue()} is set, it takes precedence over this property.
450    * </ul>
451    *
452    * <h5 class='section'>Used for:</h5>
453    * <ul class='spaced-list'>
454    *    <li>
455    *       Server-side schema-based parsing validation.
456    *    <li>
457    *       Server-side generated Swagger documentation.
458    *    <li>
459    *       Client-side schema-based serializing validation.
460    * </ul>
461    *
462    * @return The annotation value.
463    * @deprecated Use {@link #exclusiveMinimumValue()} for JSON Schema Draft 2020-12 compliance.
464    */
465   @Deprecated
466   boolean exclusiveMinimum() default false;
467
468   /**
469    * <mk>externalDocs</mk> field of the <a class="doclink" href="https://swagger.io/specification/v2#schemaObject">Swagger Schema Object</a>.
470    *
471    * <h5 class='section'>Notes:</h5><ul>
472    *    <li class='note'>
473    *       The format is a <a class="doclink" href="https://juneau.apache.org/docs/topics/JuneauBeanSwagger2">juneau-bean-swagger-v2</a> object.
474    *       <br>Multiple lines are concatenated with newlines.
475    * </ul>
476    *
477    * @return The annotation value.
478    */
479   ExternalDocs externalDocs() default @ExternalDocs;
480
481   /**
482    * Synonym for {@link #format()}.
483    *
484    * @return The annotation value.
485    */
486   String f() default "";
487
488   /**
489    * <mk>format</mk> field of the <a class="doclink" href="https://swagger.io/specification/v2#schemaObject">Swagger Schema Object</a>.
490    *
491    * <p>
492    * The extending format for the previously mentioned <a class="doclink" href="https://swagger.io/specification/v2#parameterType">parameter type</a>.
493    *
494    * <p>
495    * Static strings are defined in {@link FormatType}.
496    *
497    * <h5 class='section'>Examples:</h5>
498    * <p class='bjava'>
499    *    <jc>// Used on parameter</jc>
500    *    <ja>@RestPut</ja>
501    *    <jk>public void</jk> setAge(
502    *       <ja>@Content</ja> <ja>@Schema</ja>(type=<js>"integer"</js>, format=<js>"int32"</js>) String <jv>input</jv>
503    *    ) {...}
504    * </p>
505    *
506    * <h5 class='section'>Used for:</h5>
507    * <ul class='spaced-list'>
508    *    <li>
509    *       Server-side schema-based parsing.
510    *    <li>
511    *       Server-side generated Swagger documentation.
512    *    <li>
513    *       Client-side schema-based serializing.
514    * </ul>
515    *
516    * <ul class='values'>
517    *    <li>
518    *       <js>"int32"</js> - Signed 32 bits.
519    *       <br>Only valid with type <js>"integer"</js>.
520    *    <li>
521    *       <js>"int64"</js> - Signed 64 bits.
522    *       <br>Only valid with type <js>"integer"</js>.
523    *    <li>
524    *       <js>"float"</js> - 32-bit floating point number.
525    *       <br>Only valid with type <js>"number"</js>.
526    *    <li>
527    *       <js>"double"</js> - 64-bit floating point number.
528    *       <br>Only valid with type <js>"number"</js>.
529    *    <li>
530    *       <js>"byte"</js> - BASE-64 encoded characters.
531    *       <br>Only valid with type <js>"string"</js>.
532    *       <br>Parameters of type POJO convertible from string are converted after the string has been decoded.
533    *    <li>
534    *       <js>"binary"</js> - Hexadecimal encoded octets (e.g. <js>"00FF"</js>).
535    *       <br>Only valid with type <js>"string"</js>.
536    *       <br>Parameters of type POJO convertible from string are converted after the string has been decoded.
537    *    <li>
538    *       <js>"date"</js> - An <a href='http://xml2rfc.ietf.org/public/rfc/html/rfc3339.html#anchor14'>RFC3339 full-date</a>.
539    *       <br>Only valid with type <js>"string"</js>.
540    *    <li>
541    *       <js>"date-time"</js> - An <a href='http://xml2rfc.ietf.org/public/rfc/html/rfc3339.html#anchor14'>RFC3339 date-time</a>.
542    *       <br>Only valid with type <js>"string"</js>.
543    *    <li>
544    *       <js>"password"</js> - Used to hint UIs the input needs to be obscured.
545    *       <br>This format does not affect the serialization or parsing of the parameter.
546    *    <li>
547    *       <js>"uon"</js> - UON notation (e.g. <js>"(foo=bar,baz=@(qux,123))"</js>).
548    *       <br>Only valid with type <js>"object"</js>.
549    *       <br>If not specified, then the input is interpreted as plain-text and is converted to a POJO directly.
550    * </ul>
551    *
552    * <h5 class='section'>Notes:</h5><ul>
553    *    <li class='note'>
554    *       The format is plain text.
555    * </ul>
556    *
557    * <h5 class='section'>See Also:</h5><ul>
558    *    <li class='extlink'><a class="doclink" href="https://swagger.io/specification/v2#schemaObject">Swagger Schema Object</a>
559    * </ul>
560    *
561    * @return The annotation value.
562    */
563   String format() default "";
564
565   /**
566    * Specifies that schema information for this part should not be shown in the generated Swagger documentation.
567    *
568    * @return The annotation value.
569    */
570   boolean ignore() default false;
571
572   /**
573    * <mk>items</mk> field of the <a class="doclink" href="https://swagger.io/specification/v2#schemaObject">Swagger Schema Object</a>.
574    *
575    * <p>
576    * Describes the type of items in the array.
577    *
578    * <p>
579    * Required if <c>type</c> is <js>"array"</js>.
580    * <br>Can only be used if <c>type</c> is <js>"array"</js>.
581    *
582    * <h5 class='section'>Used for:</h5>
583    * <ul class='spaced-list'>
584    *    <li>
585    *       Server-side schema-based parsing and parsing validation.
586    *    <li>
587    *       Server-side generated Swagger documentation.
588    *    <li>
589    *       Client-side schema-based serializing and serializing validation.
590    * </ul>
591    *
592    * @return The annotation value.
593    */
594   Items items() default @Items;
595

601   String max() default "";

608   long maxi() default -1;

610   /**
611    * <mk>maximum</mk> field of the <a class="doclink" href="https://swagger.io/specification/v2#schemaObject">Swagger Schema Object</a>.
612    *
613    * <p>
614    * Defines the maximum value for a parameter of numeric types.
615    * <br>The value must be a valid JSON number.
616    *
617    * <p>
618    * If validation fails during serialization or parsing, the part serializer/parser will throw a {@link SchemaValidationException}.
619    * <br>On the client-side, this gets converted to a <c>RestCallException</c> which is thrown before the connection is made.
620    * <br>On the server-side, this gets converted to a <c>BadRequest</c> (400).
621    *
622    * <p>
623    * Only allowed for the following types: <js>"integer"</js>, <js>"number"</js>.
624    *
625    * <h5 class='section'>Used for:</h5>
626    * <ul class='spaced-list'>
627    *    <li>
628    *       Server-side schema-based parsing validation.
629    *    <li>
630    *       Server-side generated Swagger documentation.
631    *    <li>
632    *       Client-side schema-based serializing validation.
633    * </ul>
634    *
635    * @return The annotation value.
636    */
637   String maximum() default "";
638
639   /**
640    * <mk>maxItems</mk> field of the <a class="doclink" href="https://swagger.io/specification/v2#schemaObject">Swagger Schema Object</a>.
641    *
642    * <p>
643    * An array or collection is valid if its size is less than, or equal to, the value of this keyword.
644    *
645    * <p>
646    * If validation fails during serialization or parsing, the part serializer/parser will throw a {@link SchemaValidationException}.
647    * <br>On the client-side, this gets converted to a <c>RestCallException</c> which is thrown before the connection is made.
648    * <br>On the server-side, this gets converted to a <c>BadRequest</c> (400).
649    *
650    * <p>
651    * Only allowed for the following types: <js>"array"</js>.
652    *
653    * <h5 class='section'>Used for:</h5>
654    * <ul class='spaced-list'>
655    *    <li>
656    *       Server-side schema-based parsing validation.
657    *    <li>
658    *       Server-side generated Swagger documentation.
659    *    <li>
660    *       Client-side schema-based serializing validation.
661    * </ul>
662    *
663    * @return The annotation value.
664    */
665   long maxItems() default -1;
666

668    * Synonym for {@link #maxLength()}.
669    *
670    * @return The annotation value.
671    */
672   long maxl() default -1;

674   /**
675    * <mk>maxLength</mk> field of the <a class="doclink" href="https://swagger.io/specification/v2#schemaObject">Swagger Schema Object</a>.
676    *
677    * <p>
678    * A string instance is valid against this keyword if its length is less than, or equal to, the value of this keyword.
679    * <br>The length of a string instance is defined as the number of its characters as defined by <a href='https://tools.ietf.org/html/rfc4627'>RFC 4627</a>.
680    * <br>The value <c>-1</c> is always ignored.
681    *
682    * <p>
683    * If validation fails during serialization or parsing, the part serializer/parser will throw a {@link SchemaValidationException}.
684    * <br>On the client-side, this gets converted to a <c>RestCallException</c> which is thrown before the connection is made.
685    * <br>On the server-side, this gets converted to a <c>BadRequest</c> (400).
686    *
687    * <p>
688    * Only allowed for the following types: <js>"string"</js>.
689    *
690    * <h5 class='section'>Used for:</h5>
691    * <ul class='spaced-list'>
692    *    <li>
693    *       Server-side schema-based parsing validation.
694    *    <li>
695    *       Server-side generated Swagger documentation.
696    *    <li>
697    *       Client-side schema-based serializing validation.
698    * </ul>
699    *
700    * @return The annotation value.
701    */
702   long maxLength() default -1;
703
704   /**
705    * Synonym for {@link #maxProperties()}.
706    *
707    * @return The annotation value.
708    */
709   long maxp() default -1;

714    * <h5 class='section'>Notes:</h5><ul>
715    *    <li class='note'>
716    *       The format is a <a class="doclink" href="https://juneau.apache.org/docs/topics/JuneauBeanSwagger2">juneau-bean-swagger-v2</a> object.

860    * <mk>multipleOf</mk> field of the <a class="doclink" href="https://swagger.io/specification/v2#schemaObject">Swagger Schema Object</a>.
861    *
862    * <p>
863    * A numeric instance is valid if the result of the division of the instance by this keyword's value is an integer.
864    * <br>The value must be a valid JSON number.
865    *
866    * <p>
867    * If validation fails during serialization or parsing, the part serializer/parser will throw a {@link SchemaValidationException}.
868    * <br>On the client-side, this gets converted to a <c>RestCallException</c> which is thrown before the connection is made.
869    * <br>On the server-side, this gets converted to a <c>BadRequest</c> (400).
870    *
871    * <p>
872    * Only allowed for the following types: <js>"integer"</js>, <js>"number"</js>.
873    *
874    * <h5 class='section'>Used for:</h5>
875    * <ul class='spaced-list'>
876    *    <li>
877    *       Server-side schema-based parsing validation.
878    *    <li>
879    *       Server-side generated Swagger documentation.
880    *    <li>
881    *       Client-side schema-based serializing validation.
882    * </ul>
883    *
884    * @return The annotation value.
885    */
886   String multipleOf() default "";
887
888   /**
889    * Dynamically apply this annotation to the specified classes/methods/fields.
890    *
891    * <p>
892    * Used in conjunction with {@link org.apache.juneau.BeanContext.Builder#applyAnnotations(Class...)} to dynamically apply an annotation to an existing class/method/field.
893    * It is ignored when the annotation is applied directly to classes/methods/fields.
894    *
895    * <h5 class='section'>Valid patterns:</h5>
896    * <ul class='spaced-list'>
897    *  <li>Classes:
898    *       <ul>
899    *          <li>Fully qualified:
900    *             <ul>
901    *                <li><js>"com.foo.MyClass"</js>
902    *             </ul>
903    *          <li>Fully qualified inner class:
904    *             <ul>
905    *                <li><js>"com.foo.MyClass$Inner1$Inner2"</js>
906    *             </ul>
907    *          <li>Simple:
908    *             <ul>
909    *                <li><js>"MyClass"</js>
910    *             </ul>
911    *          <li>Simple inner:
912    *             <ul>
913    *                <li><js>"MyClass$Inner1$Inner2"</js>
914    *                <li><js>"Inner1$Inner2"</js>
915    *                <li><js>"Inner2"</js>
916    *             </ul>
917    *       </ul>
918    *    <li>Methods:
919    *       <ul>
920    *          <li>Fully qualified with args:
921    *             <ul>
922    *                <li><js>"com.foo.MyClass.myMethod(String,int)"</js>
923    *                <li><js>"com.foo.MyClass.myMethod(java.lang.String,int)"</js>
924    *                <li><js>"com.foo.MyClass.myMethod()"</js>
925    *             </ul>
926    *          <li>Fully qualified:
927    *             <ul>
928    *                <li><js>"com.foo.MyClass.myMethod"</js>
929    *             </ul>
930    *          <li>Simple with args:
931    *             <ul>
932    *                <li><js>"MyClass.myMethod(String,int)"</js>
933    *                <li><js>"MyClass.myMethod(java.lang.String,int)"</js>
934    *                <li><js>"MyClass.myMethod()"</js>
935    *             </ul>
936    *          <li>Simple:
937    *             <ul>
938    *                <li><js>"MyClass.myMethod"</js>
939    *             </ul>
940    *          <li>Simple inner class:
941    *             <ul>
942    *                <li><js>"MyClass$Inner1$Inner2.myMethod"</js>
943    *                <li><js>"Inner1$Inner2.myMethod"</js>
944    *                <li><js>"Inner2.myMethod"</js>
945    *             </ul>
946    *       </ul>
947    *    <li>Fields:
948    *       <ul>
949    *          <li>Fully qualified:
950    *             <ul>
951    *                <li><js>"com.foo.MyClass.myField"</js>
952    *             </ul>
953    *          <li>Simple:
954    *             <ul>
955    *                <li><js>"MyClass.myField"</js>
956    *             </ul>
957    *          <li>Simple inner class:
958    *             <ul>
959    *                <li><js>"MyClass$Inner1$Inner2.myField"</js>
960    *                <li><js>"Inner1$Inner2.myField"</js>
961    *                <li><js>"Inner2.myField"</js>
962    *             </ul>
963    *       </ul>
964    *    <li>A comma-delimited list of anything on this list.
965    * </ul>
966    *
967    * <h5 class='section'>See Also:</h5><ul>
968    *    <li class='link'><a class="doclink" href="https://juneau.apache.org/docs/topics/DynamicallyAppliedAnnotations">Dynamically Applied Annotations</a>
969    * </ul>
970    *
971    * @return The annotation value.
972    */
973   String[] on() default {};
974
975   /**
976    * Dynamically apply this annotation to the specified classes.
977    *
978    * <p>
979    * Identical to {@link #on()} except allows you to specify class objects instead of a strings.
980    *
981    * <h5 class='section'>See Also:</h5><ul>
982    *    <li class='link'><a class="doclink" href="https://juneau.apache.org/docs/topics/DynamicallyAppliedAnnotations">Dynamically Applied Annotations</a>
983    * </ul>
984    *
985    * @return The annotation value.
986    */
987   Class<?>[] onClass() default {};
988
989   /**
990    * Synonym for {@link #pattern()}.
991    *
992    * @return The annotation value.
993    */
994   String p() default "";
995
996   /**
997    * <mk>pattern</mk> field of the <a class="doclink" href="https://swagger.io/specification/v2#schemaObject">Swagger Schema Object</a>.
998    *
999    * <p>
1000    * A string input is valid if it matches the specified regular expression pattern.
1001    *
1002    * <p>
1003    * If validation fails during serialization or parsing, the part serializer/parser will throw a {@link SchemaValidationException}.
1004    * <br>On the client-side, this gets converted to a <c>RestCallException</c> which is thrown before the connection is made.
1005    * <br>On the server-side, this gets converted to a <c>BadRequest</c> (400).
1006    *
1007    * <h5 class='section'>Example:</h5>
1008    * <p class='bjava'>
1009    *    <ja>@RestPut</ja>
1010    *    <jk>public void</jk> doPut(<ja>@Content</ja> <ja>@Schema</ja>(pattern=<js>"/\\w+\\.\\d+/"</js>) String <jv>input</jv>) {...}
1011    * </p>
1012    *
1013    * <p>
1014    * Only allowed for the following types: <js>"string"</js>.
1015    *
1016    * <h5 class='section'>Used for:</h5>
1017    * <ul class='spaced-list'>
1018    *    <li>
1019    *       Server-side schema-based parsing validation.
1020    *    <li>
1021    *       Server-side generated Swagger documentation.
1022    *    <li>
1023    *       Client-side schema-based serializing validation.
1024    * </ul>
1025    *
1026    * @return The annotation value.
1027    */
1028   String pattern() default "";
1029
1030   /**
1031    * <mk>properties</mk> field of the <a class="doclink" href="https://swagger.io/specification/v2#schemaObject">Swagger Schema Object</a>.
1032    *
1033    * <h5 class='section'>Notes:</h5><ul>
1034    *    <li class='note'>
1035    *       The format is a <a class="doclink" href="https://juneau.apache.org/docs/topics/JuneauBeanSwagger2">juneau-bean-swagger-v2</a> object.
1036    *       <br>Multiple lines are concatenated with newlines.
1037    * </ul>
1038    *
1039    * @return The annotation value.
1040    */
1041   String[] properties() default {};
1042
1043   /**
1044    * Synonym for {@link #required()}.
1045    *
1046    * @return The annotation value.
1047    */
1048   boolean r() default false;
1049
1050   /**
1051    * <mk>readOnly</mk> field of the <a class="doclink" href="https://swagger.io/specification/v2#schemaObject">Swagger Schema Object</a>.
1052    *
1053    * <h5 class='section'>Notes:</h5><ul>
1054    *    <li class='note'>
1055    *       The format is a <a class="doclink" href="https://juneau.apache.org/docs/topics/JuneauBeanSwagger2">juneau-bean-swagger-v2</a> object.
1056    *       <br>Multiple lines are concatenated with newlines.
1057    * </ul>
1058    *
1059    * @return The annotation value.
1060    */
1061   boolean readOnly() default false;
1062
1063   /**
1064    * <mk>required</mk> field of the <a class="doclink" href="https://swagger.io/specification/v2#schemaObject">Swagger Schema Object</a>.
1065    *
1066    * <p>
1067    * Determines whether the parameter is mandatory.
1068    *
1069    * <p>
1070    * If validation fails during serialization or parsing, the part serializer/parser will throw a {@link SchemaValidationException}.
1071    * <br>On the client-side, this gets converted to a <c>RestCallException</c> which is thrown before the connection is made.
1072    * <br>On the server-side, this gets converted to a <c>BadRequest</c> (400).
1073    *
1074    * <h5 class='section'>Examples:</h5>
1075    * <p class='bjava'>
1076    *    <jc>// Used on parameter</jc>
1077    *    <ja>@RestPost</ja>
1078    *    <jk>public void</jk> addPet(
1079    *       <ja>@Content</ja> <ja>@Schema</ja>(required=<jk>true</jk>) Pet <jv>input</jv>
1080    *    ) {...}
1081    * </p>
1082    * <p class='bjava'>
1083    *    <jc>// Used on class</jc>
1084    *    <ja>@RestPost</ja>
1085    *    <jk>public void</jk> addPet(Pet <jv>input</jv>) {...}
1086    *
1087    *    <ja>@Content</ja>(required=<jk>true</jk>)
1088    *    <jk>public class</jk> Pet {...}
1089    * </p>
1090    *
1091    * <h5 class='section'>Used for:</h5>
1092    * <ul class='spaced-list'>
1093    *    <li>
1094    *       Server-side schema-based parsing validation.
1095    *    <li>
1096    *       Server-side generated Swagger documentation.
1097    *    <li>
1098    *       Client-side schema-based serializing validation.
1099    * </ul>
1100    *
1101    * @return The annotation value.
1102    */
1103   boolean required() default false;
1104
1105   /**
1106    * Synonym for {@link #readOnly()}.
1107    *
1108    * @return The annotation value.
1109    */
1110   boolean ro() default false;
1111
1112   /**
1113    * Synonym for {@link #skipIfEmpty()}.
1114    *
1115    * @return The annotation value.
1116    */
1117   boolean sie() default false;
1118
1119   /**
1120    * Skips this value during serialization if it's an empty string or empty collection/array.
1121    *
1122    * <p>
1123    * Note that <jk>null</jk> values are already ignored.
1124    *
1125    * <h5 class='section'>Used for:</h5>
1126    * <ul class='spaced-list'>
1127    *    <li>
1128    *       Client-side schema-based serializing.
1129    * </ul>
1130    *
1131    * @return The annotation value.
1132    */
1133   boolean skipIfEmpty() default false;

1140   String t() default "";

1143    * <mk>title</mk> field of the <a class="doclink" href="https://swagger.io/specification/v2#schemaObject">Swagger Schema Object</a>.
1144    *
1145    * <h5 class='section'>Notes:</h5><ul>
1146    *    <li class='note'>
1147    *       The format is plain text.
1148    * </ul>
1149    *
1150    * @return The annotation value.
1151    */
1152   String title() default "";
1153
1154   /**
1155    * <mk>type</mk> field of the <a class="doclink" href="https://swagger.io/specification/v2#schemaObject">Swagger Schema Object</a>.
1156    *
1157    * <p>
1158    * The type of the parameter.
1159    *
1160    * <h5 class='section'>Examples:</h5>
1161    * <p class='bjava'>
1162    *    <jc>// Used on parameter</jc>
1163    *    <ja>@RestPost</ja>
1164    *    <jk>public void</jk> addPet(
1165    *       <ja>@Content</ja> <ja>@Schema</ja>(type=<js>"object"</js>) Pet <jv>input</jv>
1166    *    ) {...}
1167    * </p>
1168    * <p class='bjava'>
1169    *    <jc>// Used on class</jc>
1170    *    <ja>@RestPost</ja>
1171    *    <jk>public void</jk> addPet(Pet <jv>input</jv>) {...}
1172    *
1173    *    <ja>@Content</ja> <ja>@Schema</ja>(type=<js>"object"</js>)
1174    *    <jk>public class</jk> Pet {...}
1175    * </p>
1176    *
1177    * <h5 class='section'>Used for:</h5>
1178    * <ul class='spaced-list'>
1179    *    <li>
1180    *       Server-side schema-based parsing.
1181    *    <li>
1182    *       Server-side generated Swagger documentation.
1183    *    <li>
1184    *       Client-side schema-based serializing.
1185    * </ul>
1186    *
1187    * <ul class='values spaced-list'>
1188    *    <li>
1189    *       <js>"string"</js>
1190    *       <br>Parameter must be a string or a POJO convertible from a string.
1191    *    <li>
1192    *       <js>"number"</js>
1193    *       <br>Parameter must be a number primitive or number object.
1194    *       <br>If parameter is <c>Object</c>, creates either a <c>Float</c> or <c>Double</c> depending on the size of the number.
1195    *    <li>
1196    *       <js>"integer"</js>
1197    *       <br>Parameter must be a integer/long primitive or integer/long object.
1198    *       <br>If parameter is <c>Object</c>, creates either a <c>Short</c>, <c>Integer</c>, or <c>Long</c> depending on the size of the number.
1199    *    <li>
1200    *       <js>"boolean"</js>
1201    *       <br>Parameter must be a boolean primitive or object.
1202    *    <li>
1203    *       <js>"array"</js>
1204    *       <br>Parameter must be an array or collection.
1205    *       <br>Elements must be strings or POJOs convertible from strings.
1206    *       <br>If parameter is <c>Object</c>, creates an {@link JsonList}.
1207    *    <li>
1208    *       <js>"object"</js>
1209    *       <br>Parameter must be a map or bean.
1210    *       <br>If parameter is <c>Object</c>, creates an {@link JsonMap}.
1211    *       <br>Note that this is an extension of the OpenAPI schema as Juneau allows for arbitrarily-complex POJOs to be serialized as HTTP parts.
1212    *    <li>
1213    *       <js>"file"</js>
1214    *       <br>This type is currently not supported.
1215    * </ul>
1216    *
1217    * <h5 class='section'>Notes:</h5><ul>
1218    *    <li class='note'>Static strings are defined in {@link ParameterType}.
1219    * </ul>
1220    *
1221    * <h5 class='section'>See Also:</h5><ul>
1222    *    <li class='extlink'><a class="doclink" href="https://swagger.io/specification#dataTypes">Swagger Data Types</a>
1223    * </ul>
1224    *
1225    * @return The annotation value.
1226    */
1227   String type() default "";
1228
1229   /**
1230    * Synonym for {@link #uniqueItems()}.
1231    *
1232    * @return The annotation value.
1233    */
1234   boolean ui() default false;
1235
1236   /**
1237    * <mk>uniqueItems</mk> field of the <a class="doclink" href="https://swagger.io/specification/v2#schemaObject">Swagger Schema Object</a>.
1238    *
1239    * <p>
1240    * If <jk>true</jk> the input validates successfully if all of its elements are unique.
1241    *
1242    * <p>
1243    * If validation fails during serialization or parsing, the part serializer/parser will throw a {@link SchemaValidationException}.
1244    * <br>On the client-side, this gets converted to a <c>RestCallException</c> which is thrown before the connection is made.
1245    * <br>On the server-side, this gets converted to a <c>BadRequest</c> (400).
1246    *
1247    * <p>
1248    * If the parameter type is a subclass of {@link Set}, this validation is skipped (since a set can only contain unique items anyway).
1249    * <br>Otherwise, the collection or array is checked for duplicate items.
1250    *
1251    * <p>
1252    * Only allowed for the following types: <js>"array"</js>.
1253    *
1254    * <h5 class='section'>Used for:</h5>
1255    * <ul class='spaced-list'>
1256    *    <li>
1257    *       Server-side schema-based parsing validation.
1258    *    <li>
1259    *       Server-side generated Swagger documentation.
1260    *    <li>
1261    *       Client-side schema-based serializing validation.
1262    * </ul>
1263    *
1264    * @return The annotation value.
1265    */
1266   boolean uniqueItems() default false;
1267
1268   /**
1269    * <mk>xml</mk> field of the <a class="doclink" href="https://swagger.io/specification/v2#schemaObject">Swagger Schema Object</a>.
1270    *
1271    * <h5 class='section'>Notes:</h5><ul>
1272    *    <li class='note'>
1273    *       The format is a <a class="doclink" href="https://juneau.apache.org/docs/topics/JuneauBeanSwagger2">juneau-bean-swagger-v2</a> object.
1274    *       <br>Multiple lines are concatenated with newlines.
1275    * </ul>
1276    *
1277    * @return The annotation value.
1278    */
1279   String[] xml() default {};
1280
1281   //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
1282   // JSON Schema Draft 2020-12 properties
1283   //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

1285   /**
1286    * <mk>const</mk> field of the JSON Schema.
1287    *
1288    * <p>
1289    * The value of this keyword MAY be of any type, including null.
1290    * An instance validates successfully against this keyword if its value is equal to the value of this keyword.
1291    *
1292    * <p>
1293    * This is a JSON Schema Draft 2020-12 property.
1294    *
1295    * <h5 class='section'>Examples:</h5>
1296    * <p class='bjava'>
1297    *    <jc>// A constant string value</jc>
1298    *    <ja>@Schema</ja>(_const=<js>"fixed-value"</js>)
1299    *    <jk>public</jk> String getStatus() {...}
1300    * </p>
1301    * <p class='bjava'>
1302    *    <jc>// A constant numeric value</jc>
1303    *    <ja>@Schema</ja>(_const=<js>"42"</js>)
1304    *    <jk>public int</jk> getMagicNumber() {...}
1305    * </p>
1306    *
1307    * <h5 class='section'>Used for:</h5>
1308    * <ul class='spaced-list'>

1311    *    <li>
1312    *       Server-side generated Swagger documentation.

1319    * </ul>
1320    *
1321    * @return The annotation value.
1322    */

1330    * There are no restrictions on the values within the array.
1331    * When multiple examples are applicable, an array of examples can be used.
1332    *
1333    * <p>
1334    * This is a JSON Schema Draft 2020-12 property.
1335    *
1336    * <h5 class='section'>Examples:</h5>

1365    * The value of this keyword MUST be a string.
1366    * Implementations MUST NOT present this string to end users.
1367    * Tools for editing schemas SHOULD support displaying and editing this keyword.

1370    * This is a JSON Schema Draft 2020-12 property.
1371    *

1379    * </p>
1380    *

1395    * It may mean the property is going to be removed in the future.
1396    *

1421   /**
1422    * <mk>exclusiveMaximum</mk> field of the JSON Schema (Draft 2020-12 numeric value).
1423    *
1424    * <p>
1425    * The value of this keyword MUST be a number.
1426    * The instance is valid if it is strictly less than (not equal to) the value specified by this keyword.
1427    *
1428    * <p>
1429    * This is a JSON Schema Draft 2020-12 property that replaces the boolean {@link #exclusiveMaximum()}.
1430    * For backward compatibility, both properties are supported.
1431    * If this property is specified, it takes precedence over the boolean version.
1432    *
1433    * <h5 class='section'>Examples:</h5>
1434    * <p class='bjava'>
1435    *    <jc>// A number that must be strictly less than 100</jc>
1436    *    <ja>@Schema</ja>(
1437    *       type=<js>"number"</js>,
1438    *       exclusiveMaximumValue=<js>"100"</js>
1439    *    )
1440    *    <jk>public</jk> Double getPercentage() {...}
1441    * </p>
1442    *
1443    * <h5 class='section'>Used for:</h5>
1444    * <ul class='spaced-list'>
1445    *    <li>
1446    *       Server-side schema-based parsing validation.
1447    *    <li>
1448    *       Server-side generated Swagger documentation.
1449    *    <li>
1450    *       Client-side schema-based serializing validation.
1451    * </ul>
1452    *
1453    * <h5 class='section'>See Also:</h5><ul>
1454    *    <li class='extlink'><a class="doclink" href="https://json-schema.org/draft/2020-12/json-schema-validation.html#rfc.section.6.2.3">JSON Schema Validation § 6.2.3</a>
1455    * </ul>
1456    *
1457    * @return The annotation value.
1458    */
1459   String exclusiveMaximumValue() default "";

1464    * <p>

1466    * The instance is valid if it is strictly greater than (not equal to) the value specified by this keyword.
1467    *
1468    * <p>
1469    * This is a JSON Schema Draft 2020-12 property that replaces the boolean {@link #exclusiveMinimum()}.
1470    * For backward compatibility, both properties are supported.
1471    * If this property is specified, it takes precedence over the boolean version.

1473    * <h5 class='section'>Examples:</h5>

1475    *    <jc>// A number that must be strictly greater than 0</jc>

1477    *       type=<js>"number"</js>,

1479    *    )

1506    *

1508    * This is a JSON Schema Draft 2020-12 property.
1509    *

1537    * <p>

1539    * Common values: "base64", "quoted-printable", "7bit", "8bit", "binary"
1540    *

1542    * This is a JSON Schema Draft 2020-12 property.

1571    *
1572    * <p>
1573    * The value of "prefixItems" MUST be a non-empty array of valid JSON Schemas.
1574    * Validation succeeds if each element of the instance validates against the schema at the same position, if any.
1575    *
1576    * <p>
1577    * This is a JSON Schema Draft 2020-12 property that provides tuple validation for arrays.

1582    *       <br>Multiple lines are concatenated with newlines.
1583    * </ul>
1584    *
1585    * <h5 class='section'>See Also:</h5><ul>

1689   /**
1690    * <mk>if</mk> field of the JSON Schema.
1691    *
1692    * <p>
1693    * This keyword's value MUST be a valid JSON Schema.
1694    * This validation outcome of this keyword's subschema has no direct effect on the overall validation result.
1695    * Rather, it controls which of the "then" or "else" keywords are evaluated.
1696    *
1697    * <p>
1698    * This is a JSON Schema Draft 2020-12 property that provides conditional schema validation.
1699    *
1700    * <h5 class='section'>Notes:</h5><ul>
1701    *    <li class='note'>
1702    *       The format is a <a class="doclink" href="https://juneau.apache.org/docs/topics/JuneauBeanJsonSchema">juneau-bean-jsonschema</a> object.
1703    *       <br>Multiple lines are concatenated with newlines.
1704    * </ul>
1705    *
1706    * <h5 class='section'>See Also:</h5><ul>
1707    *    <li class='extlink'><a class="doclink" href="https://json-schema.org/draft/2020-12/json-schema-core.html#rfc.section.10.2.2.3">JSON Schema Core § 10.2.2.3</a>
1708    * </ul>
1709    *
1710    * @return The annotation value.
1711    */
1712   String[] _if() default {};
1713
1714   /**
1715    * <mk>then</mk> field of the JSON Schema.
1716    *
1717    * <p>
1718    * This keyword's value MUST be a valid JSON Schema.
1719    * When "if" is present, and the instance successfully validates against its subschema,
1720    * then validation succeeds against this keyword if the instance also successfully validates against this keyword's subschema.
1721    *
1722    * <p>
1723    * This is a JSON Schema Draft 2020-12 property that provides conditional schema validation.
1724    *
1725    * <h5 class='section'>Notes:</h5><ul>
1726    *    <li class='note'>
1727    *       The format is a <a class="doclink" href="https://juneau.apache.org/docs/topics/JuneauBeanJsonSchema">juneau-bean-jsonschema</a> object.
1728    *       <br>Multiple lines are concatenated with newlines.
1729    * </ul>
1730    *
1731    * <h5 class='section'>See Also:</h5><ul>
1732    *    <li class='extlink'><a class="doclink" href="https://json-schema.org/draft/2020-12/json-schema-core.html#rfc.section.10.2.2.3">JSON Schema Core § 10.2.2.3</a>
1733    * </ul>
1734    *
1735    * @return The annotation value.
1736    */
1737   String[] _then() default {};
1738
1739   /**
1740    * <mk>else</mk> field of the JSON Schema.
1741    *
1742    * <p>
1743    * This keyword's value MUST be a valid JSON Schema.
1744    * When "if" is present, and the instance fails to validate against its subschema,
1745    * then validation succeeds against this keyword if the instance successfully validates against this keyword's subschema.
1746    *
1747    * <p>
1748    * This is a JSON Schema Draft 2020-12 property that provides conditional schema validation.
1749    *
1750    * <h5 class='section'>Notes:</h5><ul>
1751    *    <li class='note'>
1752    *       The format is a <a class="doclink" href="https://juneau.apache.org/docs/topics/JuneauBeanJsonSchema">juneau-bean-jsonschema</a> object.
1753    *       <br>Multiple lines are concatenated with newlines.
1754    * </ul>
1755    *
1756    * <h5 class='section'>See Also:</h5><ul>
1757    *    <li class='extlink'><a class="doclink" href="https://json-schema.org/draft/2020-12/json-schema-core.html#rfc.section.10.2.2.3">JSON Schema Core § 10.2.2.3</a>
1758    * </ul>
1759    *
1760    * @return The annotation value.
1761    */
1762   String[] _else() default {};
1763
1764   /**
1765    * <mk>$defs</mk> field of the JSON Schema.
1766    *
1767    * <p>
1768    * The "$defs" keyword reserves a location for schema authors to inline re-usable JSON Schemas into a more general schema.
1769    * The value of this keyword MUST be an object. Each value of this object MUST be a valid JSON Schema.
1770    *
1771    * <p>
1772    * This is a JSON Schema Draft 2020-12 property that replaces the older "definitions" keyword.
1773    *
1774    * <h5 class='section'>Notes:</h5><ul>
1775    *    <li class='note'>
1776    *       The format is a <a class="doclink" href="https://juneau.apache.org/docs/topics/JuneauBeanJsonSchema">juneau-bean-jsonschema</a> object.
1777    *       <br>Multiple lines are concatenated with newlines.
1778    * </ul>
1779    *
1780    * <h5 class='section'>See Also:</h5><ul>
1781    *    <li class='extlink'><a class="doclink" href="https://json-schema.org/draft/2020-12/json-schema-core.html#rfc.section.8.2.4">JSON Schema Core § 8.2.4</a>
1782    * </ul>
1783    *
1784    * @return The annotation value.
1785    */
1786   String[] $defs() default {};
1787
1788   /**
1789    * <mk>$id</mk> field of the JSON Schema.
1790    *
1791    * <p>
1792    * The "$id" keyword defines a URI for the schema, and the base URI that other URI references within the schema are resolved against.
1793    *
1794    * <p>
1795    * This is a JSON Schema Draft 2020-12 property.
1796    *
1797    * <h5 class='section'>Examples:</h5>
1798    * <p class='bjava'>
1799    *    <ja>@Schema</ja>(
1800    *       $id=<js>"https://example.com/schemas/person.json"</js>,
1801    *       type=<js>"object"</js>
1802    *    )
1803    *    <jk>public class</jk> Person {...}
1804    * </p>
1805    *
1806    * <h5 class='section'>See Also:</h5><ul>
1807    *    <li class='extlink'><a class="doclink" href="https://json-schema.org/draft/2020-12/json-schema-core.html#rfc.section.8.2.1">JSON Schema Core § 8.2.1</a>
1808    * </ul>
1809    *
1810    * @return The annotation value.
1811    */
1812   String $id() default "";
1813}
